title: 1.4 Recovering Ancient Israel
itunes:title: Recovering Ancient Israel
description: I trace the beginnings of biblical archaeology, from Carsten Niebuhr to John Garstang, the man who thought he found Joshua's city of Jericho.
content:encoded: I trace the beginnings of biblical archaeology, from Carsten Niebuhr to John Garstang, the man who thought he found Joshua's city of Jericho.
itunes:subtitle: Archaeology begins to unearth the history of ancient Israel
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
